post_message: The N.C. woman who won a $188 million Powerball last February is facing an onslaught of criticism after she posted a $12 million bond for her boyfriend…for the fourth time. Lamarr (Hot Sauce) McDow was arrested Tuesday for violating the terms of his pre-trial release. As NewsOne reported last year, Marie Holmes, 26, posted bond for McDow three times — once just weeks after she collected her winnings ($3 million), once in August ($6 million) and again in October after he was arrested for possession of a firearm by a felon. Is the public being too hard on Holmes? Is it any of our business what she does with her money? Let us know ----> @webpagelink
